snippet: The activist was arrested on Thursday after he returned from an unauthorized visit to North Korea, where he called for the reunification of the two Koreas.
abstract: Ro Su-hui, a South Korean activist, is arrested after he returns from an unauthorized visit to North Korea, where he called for the reunification of the two Koreas and bitterly criticized President Lee Myung-bak of South Korea for his hard-line North Korea policy.
lead_paragraph: The activist was arrested on Thursday after he returned from an unauthorized visit to North Korea, where he called for the reunification of the two Koreas.

headline.main: South Korea Arrests Activist After Unauthorized Trip to North
headline.print_headline: South Korea Arrests Activist After Unauthorized Trip to North
